Text:
I would love to know how to play .srt files on the ps3, or hardcode them into the mp4 so I can play them with the subtitles. If someone could please provide me with this information I would be very grateful, Thank You.

Thanks YIFY for your amazing work.
Yes, I would love to know as well, how to put a srt file in to the mp4, so when Im streaming on Serviio I can read the subtitles. Thanks for the great uploads!
